headline: Select Medical, Phreesia, Eli Lilly, Pfizer, and Brink's Shares Are Falling, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after stocks gave back some of the gains from the previous day as the White House clarified the tariffs on imports from China would add up to 145%, while the baseline 10% tariffs remained in place for most countries. This reminded investors that the global trade environment remained volatile, limiting the potential for sustained market gains.

This reminded investors that the global trade environment remained volatile, limiting the potential for sustained market gains.

headline: Pfizer Invites Shareholders to Attend Virtual 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders on April 24
summary: NEW YORK, April 10, 2025--Pfizer Inc. (NYSE: PFE) announced today that its shareholders and the general public are invited to access its virtual 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders at 9:00 a.m. EDT on Thursday, April 24, 2025. Pfizer has designed the virtual Annual Meeting to ensure that its shareholders who participate will be afforded comparable rights and opportunities to participate as they would at an in-person meeting.

raw.headline: Pfizer Invites Shareholders to Attend Virtual 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders on April 24

Pfizer has designed the virtual Annual Meeting to ensure that its shareholders who participate will be afforded comparable rights and opportunities to participate as they would at an in-person meeting.
